gulp-task-master

Project Page

Gulp is a build system built on the idea of file or content streams. To use it, you put your build code and configuration in a file called gulpfile.js. If you have a lot of build tasks, this file can get very long and hard to manage. It doesnâ€™t scale well as you add more and more tasks.

gulp-task-master aims to make managing gulp tasks more manageable. Each task is put in its own file. You can declare dependencies, and add watch configuration. This scales very well, and is flexible to almost any build configuration.
